snippet: The new generation of the classic roadster is more modern and weighs less. Known in America as the Miata, it remains remarkably true to its original mission.
abstract: Driven column review of 2016 Mazda MX-5.
lead_paragraph: The new generation of the classic roadster is more modern and weighs less. Known in America as the Miata, it remains remarkably true to its original mission.

headline.print_headline: A New Mazda MX-5, but Still the Old Driving Joy
headline.main: Video Review: A New Mazda MX-5, but Still the Old Driving Joy
